data.title: Top Universities in the Philippines
data.meta_description: Discover the top Colleges and Universities in the Philippines ranked by the uniRank's 2024 University Ranking.
data.text:
What are the most popular Colleges and Universities in the Philippines? uniRank answers this question by publishing the 2024 Philippine University Ranking of 234 Philippine higher-education institutions meeting the following uniRank selection criteria:

being chartered, licensed or accredited by the appropriate Philippine higher education-related organization

offering at least three-year bachelor's degrees or postgraduate master's or doctoral degrees

delivering courses predominantly in a traditional, non-distance education format

uniRank aims to provide a non-academic League Table of the top Philippine Universities and Colleges based on valid, unbiased and non-influenceable web metrics provided by independent web intelligence sources rather than data submitted by the Universities themselves.
